content: next corner* work single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in corner repeat from * to * around to beginning chain 1 join with slip_stitch in 1st chain 1 space chain 1 mark as beginning of round round 2 single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet all in corner chain 1 space single_crochet in each single_crochet around working single_crochet ch1 single_crochet in each corner chain 1 space to beginning of round slip_stitch in beginning space chain 1 round 3 repeat round 2 to last space slip_stitch in beginning space chain 3 counts as first double_crochet - mark as beginning of round round 4 2 double_crochet chain 2 3dc all in same space as joining chain 1 * skip next 3sc 3dc in next single_crochet chain 1 to last 5 single_crochet skip next 2 single_crochet 3dc in next single_crochet chain 1 skip next 2 single_crochet 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet all in corner chain 1 space chain 1 skip next 3 single_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet in next single_crochet * to last 3 single_crochet chain 1 skip next 3 single_crochet 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet all in corner chain 1 space repeat from * to * until last 4 single_crochet are reached skip last 4 single_crochet join with slip_stitch in top of chain 3 round 5 slip_stitch in first 2 double_crochet and in the chain 2 space **chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet all in corner chain 2 space *chain 1 skip next 3 double_crochet 3 double_crochet in next chain 1 space across to corner chain 2 space 3 double_crochet chain 2 3dc all in corner chain 2 space* repeat from * to * twice more chain 1 skip next 3 double_crochet 3 double_crochet in next chain 1 space across to last chain 1 space skip last 3 double_crochet join with slip_stitch to top of chain 3 fasten_off ** round 6 join cb with slip_stitch in first corner chain 2 space repeat round 5 from ** to ** weave in all loose ends block to finalize shape enjoy ©2006 emily dame all rights reserved
